data.text: @markcomeau23 @VanessaVVCBC The Gong Show debuted in 1976 and it made my teenage brain laugh:) Which tells you something about the level of humour on it:)

@CBCcolleenKG @VanessaVVCBC I was about to let you know the same ! He was a popular comic for a short time. And being from Dalhousie, boy was I surprised when I found out he was originally from Bathurst. Great memories!
@MJBelliveau @VanessaVVCBC Right - now I remember that name but I didn't remember that he was from Bathurst. Thanks, Marc!!!
@CBCcolleenKG @VanessaVVCBC Murray Langston ....lived in Bathurst when younger. Interviewed him when I was a reporter ... around 1989
